title: Account Management
content:

Account Management

 

  • Account Credit Status
  • Account Credit Status Holds

Account Credit Status

See here for more information on the account credit status. 

To configure the possible values for the account credit status, perform the following steps:

  1. Navigate to Menu > Master Data > Manage Customer > B2B Account Credit Status
  2. Click Create or select the required configured value and click Edit. 
  3. Enter the Account credit Status Id, the name and the description, and then click Save. 

To access this menu, the user should have omui::customer::menu::AccountCreditStatus grant. 

Account Credit Status Holds

See here for more information on the account credit status holds. 

To configure the possible values for the account credit status hold, perform the following steps:

  1. Navigate to Menu > Master Data > Manage Customer > B2B Account Credit Status holds
  2. Click Create or select the required configured value and click Edit. 
  3. Enter the Account credit Status Id and the corresponding hold type if required, and then click Save.

To access this menu, the user should have omui::order::menu::AccountCreditStatusHold grant.
